title: Trickle - Magic Canvas
author: Rajiv Ayyangar
excerpt: Trickle is an all-in-one tool that empowers everyone to build, launch, and manage powerful, beautiful AI agents, web apps, and forms. With built-in database, AI models, analytics, and designs, Trickle turns ideas into ready-to-use apps from concept to reality.
text: Trickle is an all-in-one tool that empowers everyone to build, launch, and manage powerful, beautiful AI agents, web apps, and forms. With built-in database, AI models, analytics, and designs, Trickle turns ideas into ready-to-use apps from concept to reality.
